title: Neiman Marcus logo type
content:
Can anyone suggest a script face that looks similar to the one used on the Neiman Marcus logo?

[http://www.neimanmarcus.com:80/index.jhtml](http://web.archive.org/)
author: kristin

comments.content:
It's in a Dan X. Solo book about script styles . . .

I will see if I can find it . . .

Stuart :D
